import React from 'react' import './Header.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search' import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket' import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; import { auth } from 'firebase'; import firebase from 'firebase'; function Header() { const [{ basket, user }] = useStateValue(); const login = () => { if(user){ firebase.auth().signOut(); } } return (
Hello {user?.email} {user ? `Sign Out` : `Sign In`}
Returns & Orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length}
) } export default Header
